servinfo.title: DTC U1100: Lost Communication with ECM (Reception Error)

servinfosub.title: Wiring Diagram
servinfosub.ptxt: Refer to DTC U1073: Control Module Communication Bus Off .

servinfosub.title: DTC Detecting Condition
servinfosub.ptxt: Reception error of communication data for ECM is detected more than specified time continuously.

action.ptxt: Go to DTC U1073: Control Module Communication Bus Off .
Go to DTC U0073: Control Module Communication Bus Off .

test1.ptxt: Check for proper connection at each ABS and ECM terminals with ignition switch turned OFF.
If connections are OK, recheck ABS for DTC with engine running.

action.ptxt: Intermittent trouble. Check for intermittent referring to Intermittent and Poor Connection Inspection .

test1.ptxt: Check connection of connectors of all control modules communicating by means of CAN.

action.ptxt: Intermittent trouble. Check for intermittent referring to Intermittent and Poor Connection Inspection .

test1.ptxt: Turn ignition switch to OFF position.
Disconnect connectors of ABS (ESP®) control module and ECM.
Check CAN communication circuit between ABS and ECM for open, short and high resistance.

testgroup.question: Is CAN communication circuit in good condition?

action.ptxt: Repair insulation of CAN communication line circuit referring to Precaution for CAN Communication System .

test1.ptxt: Disconnect connectors of all control modules communicating by means of CAN.
Check CAN communication circuit between control modules other than Step 6 for open, short and high resistance.

testgroup.question: Is each CAN communication circuit in good condition?

action.ptxt: Repair or replace the CAN communication line.

test1.ptxt: Connect connectors of disconnected control modules communicating by means of CAN.
Disconnect each connector and check DTC for ABS in turn.

action.ptxt: Check ABS (ESP®) control module power and ground circuit. If circuits are OK, substitute a known-good ABS (ESP®) hydraulic unit / control module assembly and recheck.
Check applicable control module power and ground circuit. If circuit is OK, substitute a known-good applicable control module and recheck.
